content: happy new year original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2020 all rights reserved this is a 10 inch square made with stylecraft special double knit and a 4mm hook yarn needed approx 118 m / 129 yards 1 original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2020 all rights reserved abbreviations st sts stitch stitches single_crochet single_crochet bp back post r round half_double_crochet half_double_crochet fp front post chain chain double_crochet double_crochet sl-st slip_stitch treble_crochet treble_crochet special stitches videos made by helen shrimpton of crystalsandcrochet com fptr2tog yo twice insert hook around the post of stitch to be worked from front to back to front yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops twice 2 loops on hook repeat around the post of next indicated st 3 loops on hook yo and pull through all 3 loops if you have trouble keeping the loops of your trebles tight watch this video treble_crochet puff all the puff stitches are as tall as a double_crochet yo insert hook in st/space yo and pull up a loop 4 times 9 loops on hook yo and pull through all 9 loops and chain 1 to close this closing chain is not counted as a stitch to make a beginning puff work as if you are making a standing stitch video puff stitches * * repeat instructions between asterisks the amount of times specified this is normally a repeat for a complete side and will consist of multiple instructions repeat instructions between parentheses the amount of times specified this is a lower level repeat hints are typed in blue us terms are used throughout 2 original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2020 all rights reserved hint in the rounds where you have to make sts after a fptr or a fptr2tog ensure that these sts are worked directly behind them do not skip any sts unless the pattern specifically tells you to 1 chain 4 puff st in the back bump of first chain chain 3 and join into the 2 loops p1 at the bottom of puff st with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count 1 puff st 2 chain-3 space 2 chain 3 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in the same st 5 double_crochet in next chain-3 space 3 double_crochet in next st 5 double_crochet in next chain-3 space join to top of chain 3 with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count 16 double_crochet 3 chain 3 counts as double_crochet and fptr around the same st double_crochet in next st fptr around the same st 15 times join to top of chain 3 with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count 16 double_crochet 16 fptr 4 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next st fptr around the same st double_crochet in next st 16 times omit last double_crochet join to top of chain 3 with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count 32 double_crochet 16 fptr 3 original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2020 all
